title: book_From_Baghdad,_with_Love
text:
ISBN-13: 9781592289806.
ISBN-10: 1592289800.
Title: From Baghdad, with Love.
Subtitle: A Marine, the War, and a Dog Named Lava.
Authors: Jay Kopelman;Melinda Roth.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=6t7ungEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Presents the story of Marine Jay Kopelman's efforts to have Lava, a dog found in Fallujah, sent to the United States, at the same time focusing on Iraqi political corruption, miltary bureaucracy, and the sufferings of ordinary Iraqis who have become the innocent victims of the war..
Published Year: 2006.
Average Rating: 4.11.
Number of Pages: 196.
Ratings Count: 6245.
